10% OFF USE CODE : FIRST100 


We are thrilled to be launching Agency - Email Templates with an amazing community here.


Every business needs emails to engage with customers. Emails should stand out from the crowd and should represent what the brand is and for what they stand and you need a well-designed email template for that we have come with Agency - Email Templates.


Key Features:


- Advanced Drag and Drop Maool Email Editor

Maool is an easy-to-use email editor that helps marketers & business owners in creating emails for their marketing campaigns.


- Single-click export to ESP (Email Service Provider)

Maool has single-click export to Mailchimp, Klaviyo, Campaign Monitor, Sendinblue, Active Campaign, Hubspot, Sendgrid, Mailgun, Aweber, Mailjet, Sparkpost, many more to come soon. 


You don't need any coding knowledge to create emails with Maool editor. Maool editor is simple and easy to use.


Please share your thoughts and questions! We welcome any feedback or suggestions, and we enjoy fulfilling user requests. We've only just begun. We are constantly striving to improve, and your feedback has a significant impact.


Big Thank You And ‚ù§ from Maool Team
